content:
I've been assuming the term "logical id" here refers to the resource's FHIR ID and not the Identifier field in the reference:
https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference

Is that accurate, and is there a way to search by reference.identifier?
It's accurate, and there's no standard way to search by reference.identifier. Can you submit a change request?

Is this something that could be corrected as it comes in to resolve the identifier to actual resources on saving?
then just using chained searching will work.
http://hl7.org/fhir/http.html#2.21.0.17.2 (if so, additional guidance in here would help)
There's no expectation for servers to resolve References with just Reference.identifier
